title: Computer Games Empower Deep Learning Research
description: The paper "Playing for Data: Ground Truth from Computer Games" is available here: http://download.visinf.tu-darmstadt.de/data/from games/ Computer graphics / VR challenge grant at Experiment: https://experiment.com/grants/graphics-and-virtualreality Other popular datasets: - CamVid - http://mi.eng.cam.ac.uk/research/projects/VideoRec/CamVid/ - CityScapes - https://www.cityscapes-dataset.com/dataset-overview/
